subject: Trades (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers are getting some help for LeBron James. The high-scoring Milwaukee point guard Mo Williams is headed to Cleveland to join James as part of a three-team trade involving Milwaukee and Oklahoma City. The six-player deal completed Wednesday reshapes the rebuilding Bucks while giving Cleveland an additional scoring threat. A Bucks spokesman said nothing was official until the league approved the trade.
